channel.title: Comments on: July 6-8: Relaxing at the Creekside Inn in Bishop
channel.description: Thru-Hike Attempt by Rick and Erica

item.title: By: Chuck Wagner
item.dc:creator: Chuck Wagner
item.description: Sorry about the weather. For days on our trip to visit and fetch back Katie, we've noticed weather way to the east and wondered how you guys were.
item.content:encoded: Sorry about the weather. For days on our trip to visit and fetch back Katie, we’ve noticed weather way to the east and wondered how you guys were.
